examples.example: 我用打印机打印出了一份精美的文档，真开心呀。

translate.english: I used the printer to print out a beautiful document, so happy.

examples.example: 我把精心制作的照片拿去打印，准备用来装饰房间。

translate.english: I took the elaborately made photos to print, preparing to use them to decorate the room.

examples.example: 我通过打印机打印出了美丽的照片，用来装饰房间，心情特别愉悦。

translate.english: I printed out beautiful photos through the printer and used them to decorate the room, feeling particularly pleasant.
